update.title: GeneraTOR update!
update.info-1: This changelog will be available to see once again after clicking the version number in the footer
update.info-2: The full app changelog available on the project's GitHub

order-message.title: Message to display in the simulator's chatbox:
order-message.info: Copy or save the content of the generated train order using buttons below:
order-message.warning-outdated-clipboard: Oops! Your browser may be a little bit depraceted since it's not supporting saving data to the clipboard! :/
order-message.warning-fill-inputs: Fill all the empty fields before copying the order!
order-message.warning-add-rows: Add at least one row before copying the order!
order-message.warning-fill-footer: Fill the following rows in the order's footer before copying it:
order-message.warning-fill-top: Fill the order number, train number and date before saving it!
order-message.warning-order-identical: Last saved order is identical as the current one!
order-message.warning-no-order-selected: Choose the already saved order first!
order-message.error-update: An error occurred while saving this order! :/
order-message.success-save-html: Saved order's message in the browser memory!
order-message.success-copy-html: Success! You may paste the order message in the simulator's chatbox now!

order-train-picker.info: Select scenery name to display active trains
order-train-picker.title: Active timetables and trains on the scenery
order-train-picker.subtitle: Click on the user below to fill the current order with their information
